property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Jokers Over Explode 2 {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap it and break one of your opponent's shields. ■ When your opponent discards this creature from your hand due to a effect of a spell or creature ability, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Master Merabeat: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, put a Jokers that has a "Jokers Over Explode" ability from your hand into the battle zone. At the end of your turn, put it on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. {SUPER}: When you put this creature, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win the game until the end of the turn.

property.value: {JOKERS OVER EXPLODE} 1 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 1. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. Then draw a card.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever a player puts a creature into the battle zone for no cost, destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-03 Mega-loaded Premium 7 Decks: Come Together!! Blazing J.O.E-kers

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Draw a card. {SUPER}: Destroy all creatures that cost the same as or less than the total number of your Jokers in the battle zone and/or your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-03 Mega-loaded Premium 7 Decks: Come Together!! Blazing J.O.E-kers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Jokers creature from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Then draw a card.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.
